body.name: OGX Weightless Hydration + Coconut Water Conditioner, 13 Ounce Bottle Sulfate-Free Surfactants
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
features: SILKY SHINY PERFECTION: Drench your dehydrated strands in this ultra-light blend with weightless, hydrating coconut water, supercharged with nutrient rich electrolytes & combined with coconut oil to transform dry, parched hair into silky, shiny perfection

WEIGHTLESS HYDRATION: OGX Weightless Hydration Coconut Water products replenish and rejuvenate dehydrated strands with a residue free formula for weightless hydration and shine; an ultra-light splash of hydration infused with coconut water & electrolytes

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.
REAL QUALITY, REAL BEAUTY: Unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX hair & skin care product collections are here to help you look your best! We’re beauty, pure & simple.
body.description: Drench your dehydrated stands in this ultra-light blend of weightless hydrating coconut water, supercharged with nutrient rich electrolytes and combined with coconut oils to transform dry, parched hair into silky shiny perfection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us We’re beauty, pure and simple. So unattainable looks don’t inspire us, but originality does. That’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability —we approach beauty in our own way. That means we’ll never ask what you want to “fix” about your hair, because that’s something you should never even think about. We just want to know what you love about it, so we can make you love it even more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with my oily hair!
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best shampoos I’ve found to help control my oily hair. It doesn’t cause any itch to the scalp and the hair isn’t waited down. It has a very light scent and my wife, who has dry hair, also uses it and is just as pleased with the product. Just had two more delivered!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: After trying a conditioner-only approach while trying to decrease my product use, which didn't work well for me, I got this shampoo. I use it by itself, in small amounts, every other shower. It's nice and light, my hair seems pretty happy with it (soft and not weighed down once dry), and it smells nicely of coconut without being too strong. I had hoped it wouldn't suds up as much as most shampoos, but it doesn't really matter that it does. Washes out cleanly. Very good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2016
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Wen for over 3 years now, but once every week or week and a half I like to give my scalp a good scrubbing with shampoo.This product is light and suds/foams easily.I then use Wen directly afterwards, it does not reverse the effect that Wen has had on my hair.Even with my long and thick hair, I only need to use a little of the product.It smells nice too.I DID NOT receive this product free or at a discount.I DO GIVE honest reviews on many products I purchase for FULL PRICE on Amazon.I have NEVER received a free or discounted item from Amazon or anyone .... other than a replacement for an item that was damaged and spilled ground coffee all over my couch and carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Shampoo & Body Wash!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo! Just bought it for the first time a month ago and I'm hooked. I prefer shampoos that also work well as a body wash, and this one does. It is really moisturizing and makes my skin feel great. I wear my hair very short, so I don't know how it is with long hair, but for me this leaves my hair and body clean and moisturized. The smell is also fantastic. It has a fresh, sweet, coconut fragrance in the shower, but doesn't leave you smelling like a coconut after the shower. I shampoo everyday, but rotate between a few different shampoos to prevent a build-up. This is a great addition to my rotation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not sure if this is better as a body wash...or shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a shampoo--mainly because it's sulfate free. However, it smells SO good...so I was tempted to use it as a body wash in addition. It left my skin moisturized and "comfortable" (winter makes my "over 60" skin dry and uncomfortable). Once I used it I expected it to weigh my hair down--but it doesn't. It leaves it soft and light. Since I couldn't decide whether to use it as a shampoo or body wash, I simply decided to use it as both...and love it. I really like this product...! Will I purchase it again? I already have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan
reviews.reviewText: I used to represent a fairly large hair care brand and overtime started to recognise what ingredients do what in a product. Now for the squeamish there’s an ingredient that some people can have an allergic reaction too, though it’s fairly low down the list which is called Diazolidinyl urea. It’s a formaldehyde, though it’s widely used in beauty product as an anti microbial. If that’s a worry then this is not for you, however I’m ok with living dangerously. I like a lot of OGX shampoos but this one tends to put moisture where you don’t need it which is closer to the scalp and none where you do need it which is on the ends of your hair. I suspect any porosity in your hair can’t hold it and it rinses out. I’ve got pretty fine hair and prefer the roots of my hair to be pretty squeaky clean to get some root lift which this doesn’t achieve. Of course it smells nice, but that’s about all I like. I’d say if you got pretty healthy medium straight hair this may be worth trying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love all OGX shampoo, but this one I like the best. It really leaves your hair soft and really smells awesome. My mom's perm always looks and feels so soft since I started using it on her. People brag on her hair all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fave shampoo
reviews.reviewText: The price jumped about 3 dollars after I bought my first bottle and it is hard to find now. I absolutely love this shampoo. I have oily fine and thin hair and this shampoo cuts the oil without drying my hair. It feels like it has conditioner innit yet my hair is still full and not weighed down. Very little tangling andvi hope they keep making it. Love the smell too.
Excelente producto, deja muy bien el cabello, emplear poco shampoo, no requieres mucho y este se vuelve rendidor...
Muy buen shampoo, no reseca el cabello y deja un aroma a coco que dura muy buen tiempo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Happy ... Bit costly if not in sale
reviews.reviewText: Since I've wavy curly hair and it's dry mostlyIt suited me alotAnd it's hydrating soo my curls looked better when I used this shampooHappy with the purchase...I bought it for 450 ₹ when it was on saleOtherwise it costs 725 ₹ which is very costlyIt's a really good product but I feel the price shouldn't exceed 500₹
Eigentlich ist dieses Shampoo nicht schlecht. Jedoch enthält dieses Polyquaternium-10. Das ist ähnliche wie Silikone und macht die Haare kaputt!
